__e: If you don't see them, you don't think about them.
I have seen you in them, them in you.
You’ll listen to the words, believe them and go and do
I always think of them out there... just like I thought of Father... the day he didn't return.
You wouldn't think him the same man.
I never really thought of them as people.
Haply some poison yet hangs on them to make me die.
- I'll keep my eye on them for you.
We must really trust them to come.
Well, good luck, everybody, if all else fails just tread on their blank blank fingers.
- You hit them with a belt?
He found his wife in bed with a roadie from ZZ Top and took a tire iron to both.
You do go to pictures that have dancing in them, don't you?
Just how could you help us?
We forgot about them. A terrible thing to say about one's relatives.
There's good in them, same as in you.
"Or you'll be beating them up and that won't do at present."
